title: Welcome
text:
I am a student at Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT), currently taking
Bachelor of Science with Honours in Applied Computing with a specialisation in Fintech.
I am particularly interested in how blockchain can improve transparency, security, and efficiency in areas such as digital payments, decentralised finance (DeFi), and financial data management.







My Photo







This GitHub Page site is created as part of Assessment 1.
It serves as:

My personal course website

A platform to present data visualisation work

A record of my learning journey in AAI1001
A Showcase about myself, including my academic interests and career aspirations in FinTech and blockchain

title: About Me
text:
About My Course
 This video explains the core modules, learning outcomes, and skills developed in the Applied Computing (FinTech) programme. It also highlights the strengths of the course and the strong demand for FinTech-related roles in the current job market.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
ü§ñ GenAI tool that I have used:
I have used ChatGPT as my GenAI tool. ChatGPT assisted me by providing simpler explanations and examples on technical concept related to programming, web development and mathematics. It was particularly useful especially when ChatGPT is able to adjust to my ability to absorb knowledge and provide explanations that are easier to understand. It also helped me debug errors, and improve the clarity of my codes.


‚öôÔ∏è How GenAI tools can assist me for my future study/work
GenAI tools such as ChatGPT can be valuable in supporting my current studies: - Clarify complex technical concepts related to programming, blockchain and mathematics - Assist in problem-solving by suggesting possible approaches or debugging steps - - Allow customised instructions so that the GenAI tool is not a ‚Äúyes-only‚Äù system, but can actively challenge assumptions, point out mistakes, and provide corrective feedback when needed. This encourages critical thinking rather than passive acceptance of generated responses.
